summary: Hofkiin is a player house connected to all the vanilla player houses (except DLC). You will find bookshelfs, crafting workbenchs (alchemy,anchantment... ), furnitures, some misc items (food, soul gem...) and markers to display your weapons and armors.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Hofkiin : Dovahkin's Home

[img]http://mxcmaxime.net/files/hofkiin.gif[/img]
[youtube]xLT6Wp8U9Z4[/youtube]
[img width=444,height=283]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83703-10-1494149425.png[/img][img width=444,height=283]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83703-3-1494149428.png[/img]
[/size][size=3]You can acces the house from all the player house ( you need the keys to go in the vanilla player house ) you can also acces it from the markers on your map : "Hofkiin West" and "Hofkiin East". There should be everything you need to store your items, display your armors and weapons, craft and even sleep.


[/size][/center][size=3]
[u]Performances and Bugs :[/u]
While playing i didn't sense any problems or bugs and frame rate should not be reduce. The only little "lag" is when you teleport inside the room but it doesn't affect the gameplay. If when you teleport to the cell for the first time the mannequins are moving just get ou and in of the cell.

[u]Credits :[/u]
Gif Created by Mxcmaxime :      [url=http://mxcmaxime.net][size=3]http://mxcmaxime.net[/size][/url]
Tapestries and Rugs : Tlaffon      [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68040/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68040/?[/url]

[/size]
author: Blacksteur83
